title: NIKKE Lovey-Dovey Ero Compendium
description: A collaborative book featuring Nikke and friends in a collection of lovey-dovey ero compendium stories, brought to you by 19 talented authors! ♪ This anthology offers a variety of Nikke-centered tales, including Lapi’s bold pursuit of the commander and Red Hood’s hesitant yet heartfelt moments. ☆ You'll also encounter the alluring yet affectionate Viper, the sultry and sophisticated Ludmilla, and even the surprising Clown, who brings a unique twist to the mix. Dive into this enchanting volume and savor dreamlike moments with your beloved Nikke!
